## Source: ossf-package-analysis (8f263b2c460c81b4e6f61cc1ce72351cf2f0b2d9ff3b745181715ca4296e22e2)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@cb-global-design-system-tokens/tailwind' @ 1.0.21 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
